column1: Funeral Services will be 10:00 a.m. Wednesday June 17

column3: Nebraska. Burial will be in Logan Park Cemetery in Sioux City with the Rev. Steven Niles officiating. Visitation will be from 4 till 8 p.m. Tuesday June 16
